statements: UPDATE pricing_strategy SET purchase_frequency = 5, purchase_amount = 1000 WHERE customer_id = 123;

UPDATE pricing_strategy SET customer_name = 'John Doe', purchase_amount = 1500.50 WHERE customer_id = 123 AND demand_level = 3;
UPDATE pricing_strategy SET purchase_frequency = 5, purchase_amount = 2000.75 WHERE customer_id = 456 AND customer_name = 'Jane Smith';

UPDATE customer_behavior SET behavior_type = 'Purchase', behavior_rating = 5 WHERE customer_id = 1234;
UPDATE transportation_demand SET transportation_type = 'Car', demand_amount = 1000 WHERE demand_id = 5678;

UPDATE transactions SET amount=1000.50, payment_method='Credit Card' WHERE transaction_id=105;
